_header: I shall you tell this ilk night
_description: A carol to St. Stephen — six quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘The holy marter Steuen we pray / To be our socour both myght and day’

BLEge3307.First Lines:
I schal yow tell þis ilk nyghtof seynt steuen godes
                    knyght…
BLEge3307.Last Lines:
…gret stonys abowte hym sprongAnd sayd wee þi meyd schall
                    pay
